description: This file contains React components for authentication modals, including API Key and OAuth authentication flows, used in a frontend application.

methods.name: AuthModals
methods.description: Main component controlling the display of API Key and OAuth authentication modals based on props.

methods.name: ModalShell
methods.description: Reusable modal shell component displaying content conditionally based on 'open' state.

methods.name: ApiKeyModal
methods.description: Component handling API Key based authentication, including form inputs and submission handling.

methods.name: OAuthModal
methods.description: Component initiating OAuth flow, displaying URL for redirection or error messages.
